user_query: I'm hosting a company event and I want to entertain the attendees with jokes. Can you search for Chuck Norris jokes that mention work? Also, give me a random joke from the Jokes by API-Ninjas API.

TaskList.description: Search for Chuck Norris jokes that mention work using a joke database or API.
Fetch a random joke from the Jokes by API-Ninjas API.
Compile and format the retrieved jokes for presentation at the company event.
